attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: LineSet is a geometry node that can contain a Coordinate|CoordinateDouble node and an (optional) Color|ColorRGBA node. Color values or a sibling Material emissiveColor is used to draw lines and points. Lines are not lit, are not texture-mapped, and do not participate in collision detection. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use a different color (or emissiveColor) than the background color. Linear interpolation of colors can be used as a good scientific visualization technique to map arbitrary function values to a color map. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: LineSet

attribute.tooltip: [applied &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether or not LineProperties are applied to associated geometry.
attribute.name: applied

attribute.tooltip: [linetype &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] linetype selects a line pattern, with solid default if defined value isn't supported. Values with guaranteed support are 1 Solid, 2 Dashed, 3 Dotted, 4 Dashed-dotted, 5 Dash-dot-dot. Optionally supported values are 6 single-headed arrow (arrow tip occurs at last point of each individual list of points), 7 single dot, 8 double-headed arrow, 10 chain line, 11 center line, 12 hidden line, 13 phantom line, 14 break line 1, 15 break line 2, 16 User-specified dash pattern.
attribute.name: linetype

attribute.tooltip: [linewidthScaleFactor &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] (v3.1 or later) linewidthScaleFactor is a scale factor multiplied by browser-dependent nominal linewidth, mapped to nearest available line width. Values zero or less provide minimum available line width.
attribute.name: linewidthScaleFactor

attribute.name: borderColor

attribute.tooltip: [borderWidth &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] [0,1] borderWidth number of pixels for texture border.
attribute.name: borderWidth

attribute.tooltip: [boundaryModeS &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureBoundaryModeValues; REPEAT] boundaryModeS describes handling of texture-coordinate boundaries. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.7 Texture boundary modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-TextureBoundaryModes for details.
attribute.name: boundaryModeS

attribute.tooltip: [boundaryModeT &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureBoundaryModeValues; REPEAT] boundaryModeT describes handling of texture-coordinate boundaries. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.7 Texture boundary modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-TextureBoundaryModes for details.
attribute.name: boundaryModeT

attribute.tooltip: [boundaryModeR &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureBoundaryModeValues; REPEAT] boundaryModeR describes handling of texture-coordinate boundaries. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.7 Texture boundary modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-TextureBoundaryModes for details.

attribute.name: magnificationFilter

attribute.tooltip: [minificationFilter &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureMinificationModeValues; FASTEST] minificationFilter indicates texture filter when image is larger than screen space representation. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.9 Texture minification modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-TextureMinificationModes for details.
attribute.name: minificationFilter

attribute.tooltip: [textureCompression &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureCompressionModeValues; FASTEST] textureCompression indicates compression algorithm selection mode. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.10 Texture compression modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-TextureCompressionModes for details.
attribute.name: textureCompression

attribute.tooltip: [texturePriority &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] texturePriority defines priority for allocating texture memory.
attribute.name: texturePriority

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "lineProperties"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: LoadSensor generates events as watchList child nodes are either loaded or fail to load. Changing watchlist child nodes restarts the LoadSensor. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use multiple LoadSensor nodes to track multiple loading nodes individually. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Background is not sensed due to multiple-image ambiguity. Warning: watchList child nodes are not rendered, so normally USE copies of other nodes to sense load status. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use Inline 'load' field to prompt or defer loading. Warning: new X3D node, not supported in VRML97.
element.name: LoadSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [timeOut &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0" #IMPLIED] Time in seconds of maximum load duration prior to declaring failure. Default value zero means use browser defaults.
attribute.name: timeOut

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when sensing starts/stops.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isLoaded &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Notify when all watchList child nodes are loaded, or at least one has failed. Sends true on successfully loading all watchList child nodes. Sends false on timeOut of any watchList child nodes, failure of any watchList child nodes to load, or no local copies available and no network present. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use multiple LoadSensor nodes to track multiple loading nodes individually.
attribute.name: isLoaded

attribute.tooltip: [loadTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time of successful load complete, not sent on failure.
attribute.name: loadTime

attribute.tooltip: [progress &outputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] [0,1] Sends 0.0 on start and 1.0 on completion. Intermediate values are browser dependent and always increasing (may indicate fraction of bytes, fraction of expected time or another metric). ข้อเสนอแนะ: only 0 and 1 events are guaranteed.
attribute.name: progress

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: LOD (Level Of Detail) uses camera-to-object distance to switch among contained child levels. (Contained nodes are now called 'children' rather than 'level', for consistent naming among all GroupingNodeType nodes.) LOD range values go from near to far (as child geometry gets simpler for better performance). For n range values, you must have n+1 children levels! Only currently selected children level is rendered, but all levels continue to send/receive events. ข้อเสนอแนะ: can add <WorldInfo info='null node'/> as nonrendering final child. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.
element.name: LOD

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [children &inputOutputLabel; &MFNodeLabel; empty list] [X3DChildNode] Grouping nodes contain a list of children nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Each grouping node defines a coordinate space for its children, relative to the coordinate space of its parent node. Thus transformations accumulate down the scene graph hierarchy.
attribute.name: children

attribute.tooltip: [forceTransitions &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Whether to perform every range-based transition, regardless of browser optimizations that might otherwise occur.
attribute.name: forceTransitions

attribute.tooltip: [center &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Viewpoint distance-measurement offset from origin of local coordinate system, used for LOD node distance calculations.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [range &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] (0,infinity) Floating-point array of camera-to-object distance transitions for each child level, where range values go from near to far. For n range values, you must have n+1 child levels! ข้อเสนอแนะ: can add <WorldInfo info='null node'/> as nonrendering final child.
attribute.name: range

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [level_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; #FIXED ""] Indicates current level of LOD children when activated.
attribute.name: level_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Material specifies surface rendering properties for associated geometry nodes. Material attributes are used by the X3D lighting equations during rendering. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert Shape and Appearance nodes before adding material.
element.name: Material

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [diffuseColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0.8 0.8 0.8"] [0,1] how much direct, angle-dependent light is reflected from all light sources. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet.
attribute.name: diffuseColor

attribute.tooltip: [emissiveColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] how much glowing light is emitted from this object. ข้อเสนอแนะ: emissiveColors glow even when all lights are off. ข้อเสนอแนะ: reset diffuseColor from default (.8 .8 .8) to (0 0 0) to avoid washout. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet. Warning: bright emissiveColor values can wash out other colors and some textures.
attribute.name: emissiveColor

attribute.tooltip: [specularColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] specular highlights are brightness reflections (example: shiny spots on an apple). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: specularColor

attribute.tooltip: [shininess &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] low values provide soft specular glows, high values provide sharper, smaller highlights. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: shininess

attribute.tooltip: [ambientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] how much ambient omnidirectional light is reflected from all light sources. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: ambientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [transparency &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] how "clear" an object is: 1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: transparency < .5 opaque, transparency > .5 transparent.
attribute.name: transparency

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "material"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: meta (metadata) provides information about the scene and uses the same definitions as HTML's meta tag. The name and content attributes provide attribute=value pairs. ข้อเสนอแนะ: X3D Abstract specification http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#METAStatement ข้อเสนอแนะ: X3D XML Encoding http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19776-1/V3.2/Part01/concepts.html#Header
element.name: meta

attribute.tooltip: [name CDATA #IMPLIED] Enter the meta (metadata) attribute name here. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use Dublin Core metadata terms for name/content values. http://www.dublincore.org/documents/dcmi-terms ข้อเสนอแนะ: if the name attribute is set, the http-equiv attribute should not be set.
attribute.name: name

attribute.tooltip: [content CDATA #REQUIRED] The content attribute provides metadata information relevant to the name attribute provided. The name and content attributes provide attribute=value pairs. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use Dublin Core metadata terms for name/content values. http://www.dublincore.org/documents/dcmi-terms ข้อเสนอแนะ: alternatively the content attribute can support the http-equiv attribute. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: content

attribute.tooltip:
[lang CDATA #IMPLIED] Language code, as per [IETF BCP47/RFC5646]
http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt and described in http://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-elements ข้อเสนอแนะ: Language Subtag Lookup at http://people.w3.org/rishida/utils/subelements
attribute.name: lang

attribute.tooltip: [dir (ltr|rtl) #IMPLIED] Direction for weak/neutral text (ltr=left-to-right, rtl=right-to-left). See http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/struct/dirlang.html#adef-dir
attribute.name: dir

attribute.tooltip: [http-equiv CDATA #IMPLIED] The http-equiv attribute provides an HTTP header for the value of the content attribute.Example: <meta http-equiv='Expires' content='Tue, 20 Aug 1996 14:25:27 GMT'>. ข้อเสนอแนะ: the http-equiv attribute can be used to simulate an HTTP response header. ข้อเสนอแนะ: if the name attribute is set, the http-equiv attribute should not be set. ข้อเสนอแนะ: see http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/struct/global.html#adef-http-equiv
attribute.name: http-equiv

attribute.tooltip: [scheme CDATA #IMPLIED] The scheme attribute allows authors to provide user agents more context for the correct interpretation of meta data. For example, <meta scheme="ISBN" name="identifier" content="0-8230-2355-9"> See http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/struct/global.html#idx-scheme
attribute.name: scheme

element.tooltip: (v3.3 or later) MetadataBoolean contains a typed list of values providing metadata information about its parent node. Further information about this Metadata node may be provided by a single child Metadata node with containerField="metadata". ข้อเสนอแนะ: IS tag precedes any Metadata tag, which precedes any other children elements.
element.name: MetadataBoolean

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.name: name

attribute.tooltip: [value &inputOutputLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #IMPLIED] The value attribute is a strictly typed data array providing relevant metadata information. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: value

attribute.tooltip: [reference &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Reference to the metadata standard or definition defining this particular metadata value.

element.tooltip: MovieTexture applies a 2D movie image to surface geometry, or provides audio for a Sound node. First define as texture, then USE as Sound source to see it/hear it/save memory. Texture maps have a 2D coordinate system (s, t) horizontal and vertical, with (s, t) values in range [0.0, 1.0] for opposite corners of the image. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert Shape and Appearance nodes before adding texture. ข้อเสนอแนะ: provide a Viewpoint that allows a clear view of the MovieTexture so that users can easily see all details. ข้อเสนอแนะ: utilize DEF/USE references for multiple copies of a single MovieTexture video file in order to avoid multiple-download delays, reduce memory requirements, and maintain synchronization. ข้อเสนอแนะ: support for MPEG-1 video format is required, other formats are optional.
element.name: MovieTexture

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [url &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Location and filename of movie file or stream. Multiple locations are more reliable, and including a Web address lets e-mail attachments work. ข้อเสนอแนะ: MFString arrays can have multiple values, so separate each individual string by quote marks [ "http://www.url1.org" "http://www.url2.org" "etc." ]. ข้อเสนอแนะ: XML encoding for " is " (a character entity). Warning: strictly match directory and filename capitalization for http links! ข้อเสนอแนะ: can replace embedded blank(s) in url queries with %20 for each blank character.
attribute.name: url

attribute.tooltip: [loop &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Repeat indefinitely when loop=true, repeat only once when loop=false.
attribute.name: loop

attribute.tooltip: [speed &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.0"] Factor for how fast the movie (or soundtrack) is played.
attribute.name: speed

attribute.tooltip: [startTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value.
attribute.name: startTime

attribute.tooltip: [stopTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value.
attribute.name: stopTime

attribute.tooltip: [repeatS &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to horizontally repeat texture along S axis.
attribute.name: repeatS

attribute.tooltip: [repeatT &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to vertically repeat texture along T axis.
attribute.name: repeatT

attribute.tooltip: [duration_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Length of time in seconds for one cycle of movie.
attribute.name: duration_changed

attribute.tooltip: [isActive: outputOnly SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when playback starts/stops.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isPaused &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isPaused true/false events are sent when MovieTexture is paused/resumed. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: isPaused

attribute.tooltip: [pauseTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When time now >= pauseTime, isPaused becomes true and MovieTexture becomes paused. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: pauseTime

attribute.tooltip: [resumeTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When resumeTime becomes <= time now, isPaused becomes false and MovieTexture becomes active. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: resumeTime

attribute.tooltip: [elapsedTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Current elapsed time since MovieTexture activated/running, cumulative in seconds, and not counting any paused time. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: elapsedTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "texture"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: MultiTexture applies several individual textures to a 3D object to achieve a more complex visual effect. MultiTexture contains multiple ImageTexture, MovieTexture and PixelTexture nodes. Texture maps have a 2D coordinate system (s, t) horizontal and vertical, with (s, t) values in range [0.0, 1.0] for opposite corners of the image. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert Shape and Appearance nodes before adding texture.
element.name: MultiTexture

attribute.tooltip: [alpha &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.0"] [0,1] The alpha field defines the alpha (1-transparency) base value for mode operations.
attribute.name: alpha

attribute.tooltip: [color &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "1 1 1"] [0,1] The color field defines the RGB base values for mode operations.
attribute.name: color

attribute.tooltip: [function &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; &MultiTextureFunctionValues; #IMPLIED] function operators COMPLEMENT or ALPHAREPLICATE can be applied after the mode blending operation. Empty string value "" indicates that no function operation is applied for that stage. ข้อเสนอแนะ: include the same number of function values as textures, otherwise the default of no function operation is applied for each remaining stage. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.5 Values for the function field http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-ValuesForFunctionField for further details.
attribute.name: function

attribute.tooltip: [mode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &MultiTextureModes; MODULATE] mode field indicates the type of blending operation, both for color and for alpha channel. ข้อเสนอแนะ: include the same number of mode values as textures, otherwise the default value MODULATE is added for each remaining stage. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.3 Multitexture modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-MultitextureModes for further details.
attribute.name: mode

attribute.tooltip: [source &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; &MultiTextureSourceValues; #IMPLIED] source field determines whether each image source is treated as DIFFUSE, SPECULAR or a multiplicative FACTOR. Empty string value "" indicates that no source modifier is applied for that stage. ข้อเสนอแนะ: include the same number of source values as textures, otherwise the default of no source interpretation is applied for each remaining stage. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.4 Values for the source field http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-ValuesForSourceField for further details.
attribute.name: source

element.tooltip: MultiTextureCoordinate contains multiple TextureCoordinate or TextureCoordinateGenerator nodes, for use by a parent polygonal geometry node such as IndexedFaceSet or a Triangle* node. Each of the contained texture coordinate nodes correspond to the multiple texture nodes contained in a sibling Appearance/MultiTexture node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: add Shape and then polgyonal/planar geometry before adding MultiTextureCoordinate.

attribute.tooltip: [type &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; "EXAMINE" "ANY"] Enter one or more quoted SFString values: "EXAMINE" "WALK" "FLY" "LOOKAT" "ANY" "NONE". ข้อเสนอแนะ: for inspection of simple objects, usability often improves with type="EXAMINE" "ANY". ข้อเสนอแนะ: types WALK and FLY force strict camera-to-object collision detection. ข้อเสนอแนะ: see Collision node for further details on camera-to-object collision detection. ข้อเสนอแนะ: MFString arrays can have multiple values, so separate each individual string by quote marks [ "http://www.url1.org" "http://www.url2.org" "etc." ] Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: type

attribute.tooltip: [speed &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.0"] [0,+infinity) Default rate at which viewer travels through scene, meters/second. Warning: default 1 m/s usually seems slow for ordinary navigation. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: speed

attribute.tooltip: [headlight &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enable/disable directional light that always points in the direction the user is looking.
attribute.name: headlight

attribute.tooltip: [avatarSize &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; "0.25 1.6 0.75"] avatarSize triplet values are: (a) collision distance between user and geometry (near culling plane of the view frustrum) (b) viewer height above terrain (c) tallest height viewer can WALK over. ข้อเสนอแนะ: keep (visibilityLimit / avatarSize.CollisionDistance) < 10,000 to avoid aliasing artifacts (i.e. polygon "tearing"). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: avatarSize

attribute.tooltip: [visibilityLimit &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.0"] Geometry beyond the visibilityLimit may not be rendered (far culling plane of the view frustrum). visibilityLimit=0.0 indicates an infinite visibility limit. ข้อเสนอแนะ: keep visibilityLimit >= zero. ข้อเสนอแนะ: keep (visibilityLimit / avatarSize.CollisionDistance) < 10,000 to avoid aliasing artifacts (i.e. polygon "tearing"). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: visibilityLimit

attribute.tooltip: [transitionType &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; "ANIMATE"] Camera transition between viewpoints. Camera transition between viewpoints. Enter one or more quoted SFString values: "ANIMATE" "LINEAR" "TELEPORT". Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: transitionType

attribute.tooltip: [transitionTime &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; "1.0"] Duration of viewpoint transition in seconds. ข้อเสนอแนะ: If transitionType is "ANIMATE", transitionTime provides browser-dependent animation parameters. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: transitionTime

attribute.tooltip: [transitionComplete &outputOnlyLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] Event signaling viewpoint transition complete. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: transitionComplete

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Setting set_bind true makes this node active setting set_bind false makes this node inactive. Thus setting set_bind true/false will pop/push (enable/disable) this node.
attribute.name: set_bind

attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Event sent when node becomes active/inactive.
attribute.name: bindTime

attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Event true sent when node becomes active, event false sent when unbound by another node.
attribute.name: isBound

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Normal defines a set of 3D surface-normal vectors that apply either to a sibling Coordinate/CoordinateDouble node, or else to a parent ElevationGrid node. Normal values are perpendicular directions that are used per-polygon or per-vertex when computing lighting and shading.
element.name: Normal

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [vector &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3fLabel; #IMPLIED] set of unit-length normal vectors, corresponding to indexed polygons or vertices.
attribute.name: vector

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "normal"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: NormalInterpolator generates a series of normal (perpendicular) vector sets along the surface of a unit sphere ROUTE values to vector attribute of a <Normal> node or another Vector3FloatArray attribute ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical input connection is ROUTE someTimeSensor.fraction_changed TO someInterpolator.set_fraction ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical output connection is ROUTE someInterpolator.value_changed TO destinationNode.set_attribute.
element.name: NormalInterpolator

element.tooltip: OrthoViewpoint provides an orthographic perspective-free view of a scene from a specific location and direction. NavigationInfo, Background, TextureBackground, Fog, LocalFog, OrthoViewpoint and Viewpoint are bindable nodes.
element.name: OrthoViewpoint

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [description &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Text description or navigation hint to identify this Viewpoint. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use spaces, make descriptions clear and readable. Warning: without description, this OrthoViewpoint is unlikely to appear on browser Viewpoints menu. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [position &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 10"] position (x, y, z in meters) relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: position

attribute.tooltip: [orientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Rotation (axis, angle in radians) of Viewpoint, relative to default -Z axis direction in local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: this is orientation _change_ from default direction (0 0 -1). ข้อเสนอแนะ: complex rotations can be accomplished axis-by-axis using parent Transforms.
attribute.name: orientation

attribute.tooltip: [centerOfRotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] centerOfRotation point relates to NavigationInfo EXAMINE mode.
attribute.name: centerOfRotation

attribute.tooltip: [fieldOfView &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; "-1 -1, 1 1"] Minimum and maximum extents of view in units of local coordinate system. Small field of view roughly corresponds to a telephoto lens, large field of view roughly corresponds to a wide-angle lens. Warning: minimum corner must remain less than maximum corner. ข้อเสนอแนะ: rectangular display width/height = (maxX-minX) / (maxY-minY)
attribute.name: fieldOfView

attribute.tooltip: [jump &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Transition instantly by jumping, or smoothly adjust offsets in place when changing to this Viewpoint. ข้อเสนอแนะ: set jump=true for smooth camera motion when going to this viewpoint.
attribute.name: jump

attribute.tooltip: [retainUserOffsets &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Retain (true) or reset to zero (false) any prior user navigation offsets from defined viewpoint position, orientation.
attribute.name: retainUserOffsets

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Sending event set_bind=true makes this node active. Sending event set_bind=false makes this node inactive. Thus setting set_bind to true/false will pop/push (enable/disable) this Viewpoint.
attribute.name: set_bind

attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Event sent when node becomes active/inactive.
attribute.name: bindTime

attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Event true sent when node becomes active, event false sent when unbound by another node.
attribute.name: isBound

attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: PixelTexture creates a 2D-image texture map using a numeric array of pixel values. Texture maps have a 2D coordinate system (s, t) horizontal and vertical, with (s, t) values in range [0.0, 1.0] for opposite corners of the image. ข้อเสนอแนะ: this is a good way to bundle image(s) into a single scene file, avoiding multiple downloads. Warning: aggregate file size can grow dramatically. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert Shape and Appearance nodes before adding texture.
element.name: PixelTexture

attribute.tooltip: [image &inputOutputLabel; &SFImageLabel; "0 0 0"] Defines image: width height number_of_components pixel_values. width and height are pixel count, number_of_components = 1 (intensity), 2 (intensity alpha), 3 (red green blue), 4 (red green blue alpha-transparency). Example: intensity [1 2 1 0xFF 0x00] Example: intensity-alpha [2 2 1 0 255 255 0] Example: red-green-blue [2 4 3 0xFF0000 0xFF00 0 0 0 0 0xFFFFFF 0xFFFF00] Example: red-green-blue-alpha [2 2 4 0xFFFFFFAA 0xFFFF00AA 0x11111111AA 0x787800AA]
attribute.name: image

attribute.tooltip: [repeatS &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to horizontally repeat texture along S axis.
attribute.name: repeatS

attribute.tooltip: [repeatT &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to vertically repeat texture along T axis.

attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [minPosition &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "0 0"] minPosition and maxPosition clamp translations to a range of values measured from origin of Z=0 plane default maxPosition < minPosition means no clamping. ข้อเสนอแนะ: create a LineSensor by constraining one axis (minPosition.x=maxPosition.x) or (minPosition.y=maxPosition.y).
attribute.name: minPosition

attribute.tooltip: [maxPosition &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "-1 -1"] minPosition and maxPosition clamp translations to a range of values measured from origin of Z=0 plane default maxPosition < minPosition means no clamping. ข้อเสนอแนะ: create a LineSensor by constraining one axis (minPosition.x=maxPosition.x) or (minPosition.y=maxPosition.y).
attribute.name: maxPosition

attribute.tooltip: [autoOffset &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Determines whether previous offset values are remembered/accumulated.
attribute.name: autoOffset

attribute.tooltip: [offset &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Sends event and remembers last value sensed. Warning: ROUTE connecting translation_changed to set_offset creates positive feedback loop and unmanageable response
attribute.name: offset

attribute.tooltip: [trackPoint_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] trackPoint_changed events give intersection point of bearing with sensor's virtual geometry.
attribute.name: trackPoint_changed

attribute.tooltip: [translation_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] translation_changed events equal sum of relative translation change plus offset value.
attribute.name: translation_changed

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when triggering the sensor. isActive=true when primary mouse button is pressed, isActive=false when released.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isOver &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] is pointing device over sensor's geometry?
attribute.name: isOver

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: PointLight is a single light source that illuminates outwards in all directions. Light illuminates all geometry and is normally scoped to illuminate peers and children nodes within the scene graph hierarchy Lights have no visible shape themselves and shine through occluding geometry. ข้อเสนอแนะ: HeadLight enabled on/off is controlled by NavigationInfo.
element.name: PointLight

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [on &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables this light source.
attribute.name: on

attribute.tooltip: [color &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "1 1 1"] [0,1] color of light, applied to colors of objects.
attribute.name: color

attribute.tooltip: [location &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Position of light relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: location

attribute.tooltip: [intensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] [0,1] Brightness of direct emission from the light.
attribute.name: intensity

attribute.tooltip: [ambientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] Brightness of ambient (nondirectional background) emission from the light.
attribute.name: ambientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [radius &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "100"] Maximum effective distance of light relative to local light position, affected by ancestor scaling.
attribute.name: radius

attribute.tooltip: [attenuation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 0 0"] Constant, linear-distance and squared-distance dropoff factors.
attribute.name: attenuation

attribute.tooltip: [global &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Global lights illuminate all objects within their volume of lighting influence. Scoped lights only illuminate objects within the same transformation hierarchy.
attribute.name: global

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: PointSet is a node that contains a set of colored 3D points, represented by contained Color/ColorRGBA and Coordinate/CoordinateDouble nodes. Color values or a sibling Material emissiveColor is used to draw lines and points. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use a different color (or emissiveColor) than the background color. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: PointSet

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

element.tooltip: PositionInterpolator generates a series of triplet values. Results can be ROUTEd to a <Transform> node's 'translation' attribute or another Vector3Float attribute ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical input connection is ROUTE someTimeSensor.fraction_changed TO someInterpolator.set_fraction ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical output connection is ROUTE someInterpolator.value_changed TO destinationNode.set_attribute.

element.tooltip: ProtoDeclare is a Prototype Declaration, defining a new node made up of other node(s). ProtoDeclare contains ProtoInterface and ProtoBody elements. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ProtoInterface contains field interfaces using the <field> tag, then ProtoBody contains the X3D nodes making up this prototype. ข้อเสนอแนะ: initial scene node in a ProtoDeclare body determines this prototype's node type.
element.name: ProtoDeclare

attribute.tooltip: [name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED] name of this prototype being declared.
attribute.name: name

attribute.tooltip: [appinfo &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Application information to provide simple description usable as a tooltip, similar to XML Schema appinfo tag.
attribute.name: appinfo

attribute.tooltip: [documentation &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Documentation url for further information, similar to XML Schema documentation tag.
attribute.name: documentation

element.tooltip: ProtoInterface is the first element inside ProtoDeclare and holds field definitions.
element.name: ProtoInterface

element.tooltip: ProtoBody collects ProtoDeclare body nodes. Warning: only the first top-level node and its children are rendered, subsequent nodes (such as Scripts and ROUTEs) will be active but will not be drawn.
element.name: ProtoBody

element.tooltip: ProtoInstance creates an instance of a locally or externally declared prototype node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: override default initializations of field values using <fieldValue> elements. Warning: the local context of this ProtoInstance must match the node type of the first node in the original ProtoDeclare declaration.
element.name: ProtoInstance

attribute.tooltip: [name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED] name of the prototype node being instanced. ข้อเสนอแนะ: must match name of corresponding ProtoDeclare or ExternProtoDeclare in this scene.
attribute.name: name

element.tooltip: Scene is the root node that contains an X3D scene graph. Add nodes and children to build a scene. Only one Scene root node is allowed per file. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Scene fields expose the functionality of the Script node's Browser class. Note: Scene nodes within Inlined worlds report identical values as top-most root Scene node. Warning: browser support for fields in this node is partial/experimental.
element.name: Scene

element.tooltip: Script provides programmed behavior for a scene. Define the script interface with <field> elements. Scripting code is embedded in a child CDATA node or (deprecated) in the url field. Optionally supported languages: ECMAScript/JavaScript and (via url to a myNode.class file) Java.
element.name: Script

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF defines a unique ID name for this node, referencable by other nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: DEF name is needed or else ROUTEs cannot connect Script node interfaces. ข้อเสนอแนะ: descriptive DEF names improve clarity and help document a model.
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [url &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] points to a script file or contains scripting code preferred alternative to url scripts: insert a CDATA node to contain embedded source code. CDATA blocks can protect literals like < and > from syntax checkers. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ECMAScript is the same as JavaScript.
attribute.name: url

attribute.tooltip: [directOutput &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Set directOutput true if Script has field reference(s) of type SFNode/MFNode, and also uses direct access to modify attributes of a referenced node in the Scene. ข้อเสนอแนะ: set directOutput true if Script dynamically establishes or breaks ROUTEs. ข้อเสนอแนะ: directOutput is a browser hint to avoid overoptimizing referenced nodes, since the Script may change their attribute values without ROUTEd events. ข้อเสนอแนะ: directOutput false means Script cannot modify referenced nodes or change ROUTEs.
attribute.name: directOutput

attribute.tooltip: [mustEvaluate &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] If mustEvaluate false, then browser may delay sending input events to Script until outputs are needed. If mustEvaluate true, then Script must receive input events immediately without browser delays. ข้อเสนอแนะ: set mustEvaluate true when sending/receiving values via the network.
attribute.name: mustEvaluate

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Shape can appear under any grouping node. Shape can contain an Appearance node and a geometry node (Box Cone Cylinder ElevationGrid Extrusion IndexedFaceSet IndexedLineSet LineSet PointSet Sphere Text). ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: Shape

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: The Sound node controls the 3D spatialization of sound playback by a child AudioClip or MovieTexture node. Sound intensity includes stereo support, varying according to user location and view direction in the scene. ข้อเสนอแนะ: if the audio source is stereo or multi-channel, channel separation is retained during playback. Warning: while providing sounds on the ground plane, ensure that the audible auralization ellipse is sufficiently elevated to match avatar height.
element.name: Sound

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [location &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Position of sound center, relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: location

attribute.tooltip: [direction &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 1"] direction of sound axis, relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: direction

attribute.tooltip: [intensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] Factor [0,1] adjusting loudness (decibels) of emitted sound.
attribute.name: intensity

attribute.tooltip: [minFront &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] Inner (full volume) ellipsoid distance along front direction. Ensure minFront <= maxFront.
attribute.name: minFront

attribute.tooltip: [minBack &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] Inner (full volume) ellipsoid distance along back direction. Ensure minBack <= maxBack.
attribute.name: minBack

attribute.tooltip: [maxFront &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "10"] Outer (zero volume) ellipsoid distance along front direction. Ensure minFront <= maxFront.
attribute.name: maxFront

attribute.tooltip: [maxBack &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "10"] Outer (zero volume) ellipsoid distance along back direction. Ensure minBack <= maxBack.
attribute.name: maxBack

attribute.tooltip: [priority &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] Player hint [0,1] if needed to choose which sounds to play.
attribute.name: priority

attribute.tooltip: [spatialize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to spatialize sound playback relative to viewer. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only effective between minimum and maximum ellipsoids.
attribute.name: spatialize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Sphere is a geometry node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.
element.name: Sphere

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [radius &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] Size in meters. Warning: simple-geometry dimensions cannot be changed after initial creation, use Transform scale instead.
attribute.name: radius

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility. Warning: solid false not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: SphereSensor converts pointing device motion into a spherical rotation about the origin of the local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Sensors are affected by peer nodes and children of peers. ข้อเสนอแนะ: add transparent geometry to see the effect of the sensor.
element.name: SphereSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [description &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Text description to be displayed for action of this node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use spaces, make descriptions clear and readable. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & or " for " ).
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [autoOffset &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Determines whether previous offset values are remembered/accumulated.
attribute.name: autoOffset

attribute.tooltip: [offset &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 1 0 0"] Sends event and remembers last value sensed. Warning: ROUTE connecting rotation_changed to set_offset creates positive feedback loop and unmanageable response
attribute.name: offset

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when triggering the sensor. isActive=true when primary mouse button is pressed, isActive=false when released.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isOver &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] is pointing device over sensor's geometry?
attribute.name: isOver

attribute.tooltip: [rotation_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; #FIXED ""] rotation_changed events equal sum of relative bearing changes plus offset value.
attribute.name: rotation_changed

attribute.tooltip: [trackPoint_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] trackPoint_changed events give intersection point of bearing with sensor's virtual geometry.
attribute.name: trackPoint_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: SpotLight is a light source that illuminates geometry within a conical beam. Light illuminates all geometry and is normally scoped to illuminate peers and children nodes within the scene graph hierarchy Lights have no visible shape themselves and shine through occluding geometry. ข้อเสนอแนะ: HeadLight enabled on/off is controlled by NavigationInfo.
element.name: SpotLight

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [on &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables this light source.
attribute.name: on

attribute.tooltip: [color &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "1 1 1"] [0,1] color of light, applied to colors of objects.
attribute.name: color

attribute.tooltip: [location &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Position of light relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: location

attribute.tooltip: [direction &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 -1"] Orientation vector of light relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: direction

attribute.tooltip: [intensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] [0,1] Brightness of direct emission from the light.
attribute.name: intensity

attribute.tooltip: [ambientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] Brightness of ambient (nondirectional background) emission from the light.
attribute.name: ambientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [attenuation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 0 0"] Constant, linear-distance and squared-distance dropoff factors.
attribute.name: attenuation

attribute.tooltip: [radius &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "100"] Maximum effective distance of light relative to local light position, affected by ancestor scaling.
attribute.name: radius

attribute.tooltip: [beamWidth &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.570796"] Inner solid angle (in radians) where light source has uniform full intensity. If beamWidth > cutOffAngle, beamWidth reset to equal cutOffAngle.
attribute.name: beamWidth

attribute.tooltip: [cutOffAngle &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; ".7854"] Outer solid angle (in radians) where light source intensity becomes zero. If beamWidth > cutOffAngle, beamWidth reset to equal cutOffAngle.
attribute.name: cutOffAngle

attribute.tooltip: [global &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Global lights illuminate all objects within their volume of lighting influence. Scoped lights only illuminate objects within the same transformation hierarchy.
attribute.name: global

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: StaticGroup is a Grouping node that can contain most nodes. StaticGroup children are guaranteed to not change, send events, receive events, or include re-USE-able content. This allows browser optimizations of contained-node content. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.
element.name: StaticGroup

Thus transformations accumulate down the scene graph hierarchy.
attribute.name: children

attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [deletionAllowed &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] If deletionAllowed is true, then previously entered character in enteredText can be removed. If deletionAllowed is false, then characters may only be added to the string. ข้อเสนอแนะ: deletion key is typically defined by local system.
attribute.name: deletionAllowed

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when triggering the sensor. isActive=true when primary mouse button is pressed, isActive=false when released.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [enteredText &outputOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #FIXED ""] Events generated as character-producing keys are pressed on keyboard.
attribute.name: enteredText

attribute.tooltip: [finalText &outputOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #FIXED ""] Events generated when sequence of keystrokes matches keys in terminationText string when this condition occurs, enteredText is moved to finalText and enteredText is set to empty string. ข้อเสนอแนะ: termination key is typically defined by local system.
attribute.name: finalText

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Switch is a Grouping node that only renders one (or zero) child at a time. Switch can contain most nodes. (Contained nodes are now called 'children' rather than 'choice', for consistent naming among all GroupingNodeType nodes.) All child choices continue to receive & send events regardless of whichChoice is active. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: authors can temporarily hide test geometry under an unselected child of a Switch. This is a good alternative to "commenting out" nodes.
element.name: Switch

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [children &inputOutputLabel; &MFNodeLabel; empty list] [X3DChildNode] Grouping nodes contain a list of children nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Each grouping node defines a coordinate space for its children, relative to the coordinate space of its parent node. Thus transformations accumulate down the scene graph hierarchy.
attribute.name: children

attribute.tooltip: [whichChoice &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "-1"] Index of active child choice, counting from 0. Warning: default whichChoice= -1 means no selection (and no rendering), whichChoice=0 means initial child.
attribute.name: whichChoice

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Text is a geometry node that can contain a FontStyle node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: Text

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [string &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Single or multiple string values to present as Text. ข้อเสนอแนะ: MFString arrays can have multiple values, so separate each individual string by quote marks ข้อเสนอแนะ: Strings can contain quote marks by first escaping them with a backslash example: "say \"hello\" please" ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: string

attribute.tooltip: [length &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Array of length values for each text string in the local coordinate system. Each string is stretched or compressed to fit.
attribute.name: length

attribute.tooltip: [maxExtent &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.0"] Limits/compresses all text strings if max string length is longer than maxExtent, as measured in local coordinate system.
attribute.name: maxExtent

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility. Warning: solid false not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [lineBounds &outputOnlyLabel; &MFVec2fLabel; #IMPLIED] Array of 2D bounding box values for each line of text in the local coordinate system.
attribute.name: lineBounds

attribute.tooltip: [textBounds &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; #IMPLIED] 2D bounding box value for all lines of text in the local coordinate system.
attribute.name: textBounds

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TextureBackground simulates ground and sky, using vertical arrays of wraparound color values, TextureBackground can also provide backdrop texture images on all six sides. Field names of child texture nodes are in alphabetic order: backTexture, bottomTexture, frontTexture, leftTexture, rightTexture, topTexture. NavigationInfo, Background, TextureBackground, Fog, LocalFog, OrthoViewpoint and Viewpoint are bindable nodes.
element.name: TextureBackground

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [skyColor &inputOutputLabel; &MFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] Color of the sky at various angles on the sky sphere. First value is color of sky at 0.0 radians representing the zenith (straight up). Warning: you must have one more skyColor value than skyAngle values. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: only one color might be rendered, others can be ignored.
attribute.name: skyColor

attribute.tooltip: [skyAngle &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] [0,π] The angle values increase from 0.0 zenith (straight up) to π/2=1.570796 (horizon) to π=3.14159 (nadir). Warning: you must have one more skyColor value than skyAngle values. Warning: colors at skyAngle=0 are ignored. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: skyAngle

attribute.tooltip: [groundColor &inputOutputLabel; &MFColorLabel; #IMPLIED] Color of the ground at the various angles on the ground partial sphere. First value is color of ground at 0.0 radians representing the nadir (straight down). Warning: you must have one more groundColor value than groundAngle values. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: groundColor

attribute.tooltip: [groundAngle &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] [0,π/2] The angle values increase from 0.0 nadir (straight down) to π/2=1.570796 (horizon). Warning: you must have one more groundColor value than groundAngle values. Warning: colors at groundAngle=0 are ignored. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: groundAngle

attribute.tooltip: [transparency &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; "0"] transparency applied to texture images, enabling X3D scene to overlay an HTML page or desktop.
attribute.name: transparency

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Input event set_bind=true makes this node active, input event set_bind=false makes this node inactive. Thus setting set_bind true/false will pop/push (enable/disable) this node.
attribute.name: set_bind

attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] event sent when node becomes active/inactive.
attribute.name: bindTime

attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] event true sent when node becomes active, event false sent when unbound by another node.
attribute.name: isBound

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TextureCoordinate specifies 2D (s,t) texture-coordinate points, used by vertex-based geometry nodes (such as IndexedFaceSet or ElevationGrid) to map textures to vertices (and patches to polygons). ข้อเสนอแนะ: add Shape and then polgyonal/planar geometry before adding TextureCoordinate.
element.name: TextureCoordinate

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [point &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec2fLabel; #IMPLIED] pairs of 2D (s,t) texture coordinates, either in range [0,1] or higher if repeating.
attribute.name: point

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "texCoord"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TextureCoordinateGenerator computes 2D (s,t) texture-coordinate points, used by vertex-based geometry nodes (such as IndexedFaceSet or ElevationGrid) to map textures to vertices (and patches to polygons). ข้อเสนอแนะ: add Shape and then polgyonal/planar geometry before adding TextureCoordinateGenerator.
element.name: TextureCoordinateGenerator

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
