attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [mode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &TextureCoordinateGeneratorModes; SPHERE] parameter field defines the algorithm used to compute texture coordinates. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ดูที่ตาราง 18.6 Texture coordinate generation modes http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#t-Texturecoordgeneration for further details.
attribute.name: mode

attribute.tooltip: [parameter &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec2fLabel; #IMPLIED] parameter array contains scale and translation (x y z) values for Perlin NOISE mode, parameter[0] contains index of refraction for SPHERE-REFLECT mode, parameter[0] contains index of refraction and parameter[1 to 3] contains the eye point in local coordinates for SPHERE-REFLECT-LOCAL mode.
attribute.name: parameter

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "texCoord"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TextureTransform shifts 2D texture coordinates to position, orient and scale image patches. Warning: resulting visible effects appear reversed because image changes occur before mapping to geometry. ข้อเสนอแนะ: order of operations is translation, rotation about center, non-uniform scale about center. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert Shape and Appearance nodes before adding TextureTransform.
element.name: TextureTransform

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [translation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "0 0"] Lateral/vertical shift in 2D (s,t) texture coordinates (opposite effect appears on geometry).
attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "0 0"] center point in 2D (s,t) texture coordinates for rotation and scaling.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] single rotation angle of texture about center (opposite effect appears on geometry). Warning: use a single radian angle value, not a 4-tuple Rotation.
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "1 1"] Non-uniform planar scaling of texture about center (opposite effect appears on geometry).
attribute.name: scale

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "textureTransform"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TimeSensor continuously generates events as time passes. Typical use: ROUTE thisTimeSensor.fraction_changed TO someInterpolator.set_fraction. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: TimeSensor may be ignored if cycleInterval < 0.01 second. ข้อเสนอแนะ: event timing details are explained in 4.4.8.3 Execution model http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/concepts.html#ExecutionModel
element.name: TimeSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [cycleInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "1.0"] cycleInterval is loop duration in seconds. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: TimeSensor may be ignored if cycleInterval < 0.01 second.
attribute.name: cycleInterval

attribute.tooltip: [loop &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Repeat indefinitely when loop=true, repeat only once when loop=false.
attribute.name: loop

attribute.tooltip: [startTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When time now >= startTime, isActive becomes true and TimeSensor becomes active. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value.
attribute.name: startTime

attribute.tooltip: [stopTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When stopTime becomes <= time now, isActive becomes false and TimeSensor becomes inactive. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value.
attribute.name: stopTime

attribute.tooltip: [cycleTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] cycleTime sends a time outputOnly at startTime, and also at the beginning of each new cycle (useful for synchronization with other time-based objects).
attribute.name: cycleTime

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when TimeSensor starts/stops running.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isPaused &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isPaused true/false events are sent when TimeSensor is paused/resumed. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: isPaused

attribute.tooltip: [pauseTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When time now >= pauseTime, isPaused becomes true and TimeSensor becomes paused. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: pauseTime

attribute.tooltip: [resumeTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] When resumeTime becomes <= time now, isPaused becomes false and TimeSensor becomes inactive. Absolute time: number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. ข้อเสนอแนะ: usually receives a ROUTEd time value. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: resumeTime

attribute.tooltip: [elapsedTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Current elapsed time since TimeSensor activated/running, cumulative in seconds, and not counting any paused time. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: elapsedTime

attribute.tooltip: [fraction_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] fraction_changed continuously sends value in range [0,1] showing time progress in the current cycle.
attribute.name: fraction_changed

attribute.tooltip: [time &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time continuously sends the absolute time (since January 1, 1970) for a given simulation tick.
attribute.name: time

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TimeTrigger converts boolean true events to time events.
element.name: TimeTrigger

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [set_boolean &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] If set_boolean input is true, trigger output time value.
attribute.name: set_boolean

attribute.tooltip: [triggerTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] triggerTime is output time event, sent when set_boolean input is true.
attribute.name: triggerTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TouchSensor tracks location & state of the pointing device, detecting when a user points at and selects geometry. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Sensors are affected by peer nodes and children of peers.
element.name: TouchSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [description &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Text description to be displayed for action of this node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use spaces, make descriptions clear and readable. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & or " for " ).
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Click or move the mouse (pointer) to generate isActive events. Output event isActive=true is sent when primary mouse button is pressed. Output event isActive=false is sent when primary mouse button is released.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isOver &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] is pointing device over sensor's geometry?
attribute.name: isOver

attribute.tooltip: [hitPoint_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] Events containing 3D point on surface of underlying geometry, given in TouchSensor's local coordinate system.
attribute.name: hitPoint_changed

attribute.tooltip: [hitNormal_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] Events containing surface normal vector at the hitPoint.
attribute.name: hitNormal_changed

attribute.tooltip: [hitTexCoord_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; #FIXED ""] Events containing texture coordinates of surface at the hitPoint.
attribute.name: hitTexCoord_changed

attribute.tooltip: [touchTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] Time event generated when sensor is touched by pointing device.
attribute.name: touchTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Transform is a Grouping node that can contain most nodes. Transform translates, orients and scales child geometry within the local world coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: +Y axis is the up direction. (Similarly some scenes may consider +X is North and +Z is East.) ข้อเสนอแนะ: best approach is to keep +Y axis in up direction for scene composability and effective browser assistance (which is based on gravity direction). ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: translation rotation and scaling field attributes can be defined in any order for a single Transform node, the order of operations remains consistent. Split operations into nested parent/child Transform nodes if a different order of operation is desired.
element.name: Transform

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [children &inputOutputLabel; &MFNodeLabel; empty list] [X3DChildNode] Grouping nodes contain a list of children nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Each grouping node defines a coordinate space for its children, relative to the coordinate space of its parent node. Thus transformations accumulate down the scene graph hierarchy.
attribute.name: children

attribute.tooltip: [translation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Position (x, y, z in meters) of children relative to local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Orientation (axis, angle in radians) of children relative to local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Translation offset from origin of local coordinate system, applied prior to rotation or scaling. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 1 1"] Non-uniform x-y-z scale of child coordinate system, adjusted by center and scaleOrientation. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: scale

attribute.tooltip: [scaleOrientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Preliminary rotation of coordinate system before scaling (to allow scaling around arbitrary orientations). ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: scaleOrientation

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: IndexedTriangleFanSet is a geometry node that can contain a Color/ColorRGBA, Coordinate/CoordinateDouble, Normal and TextureCoordinate nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: IndexedTriangleFanSet

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [index &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] (-1,+infinity) index specifies triangles by connecting Coordinate vertices, each individual fan separated by -1 sentinel value. ข้อเสนอแนะ: first indexed coordinate is fan center.
attribute.name: index

attribute.tooltip: [ccw &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] ccw = counterclockwise: ordering of vertex coordinates orientation. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ccw false can reverse solid (backface culling) and normal-vector orientation.
attribute.name: ccw

attribute.tooltip: [colorPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Color node is applied per vertex (true) or per polygon (false).
attribute.name: colorPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [normalPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Normal vectors are applied per vertex (true) or per polygon (false).
attribute.name: normalPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [fanCount &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] (3,+infinity) fanCount array provides number of vertices in each fan.
attribute.name: fanCount

attribute.tooltip: [ccw &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] ccw = counterclockwise: ordering of vertex coordinates orientation. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ccw false can reverse solid (backface culling) and normal-vector orientation.
attribute.name: ccw

attribute.tooltip: [colorPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Color node is applied per vertex (true) or per polygon (false).
attribute.name: colorPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [normalPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Normal vectors are applied per vertex (true) or per polygon (false).
attribute.name: normalPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TriangleSet is a geometry node that can contain a Color/ColorRGBA, Coordinate/CoordinateDouble, Normal and TextureCoordinate nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: you can also substitute a type-matched ProtoInstance node for contained content.
element.name: TriangleSet

element.name: TwoSidedMaterial

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [separateBackColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] separateBackColor determines whether separate Material values are used for back faces. Warning: backface Material values are ignored unless you set separateBackColor='true'
attribute.name: separateBackColor

attribute.tooltip: [backDiffuseColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0.8 0.8 0.8"] [0,1] how much direct, angle-dependent light is reflected from all light sources. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet.
attribute.name: backDiffuseColor

attribute.tooltip: [backEmissiveColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] how much glowing light is emitted from this object. ข้อเสนอแนะ: emissiveColors glow even when all lights are off. ข้อเสนอแนะ: reset diffuseColor from default (.8 .8 .8) to (0 0 0) to avoid washout. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet. Warning: bright emissiveColor values can wash out other colors and some textures.
attribute.name: backEmissiveColor

attribute.tooltip: [backSpecularColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] specular highlights are brightness reflections (example: shiny spots on an apple). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: backSpecularColor

attribute.tooltip: [backShininess &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] low values provide soft specular glows, high values provide sharper, smaller highlights. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: backShininess

attribute.tooltip: [backAmbientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] how much ambient omnidirectional light is reflected from all light sources. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: backAmbientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [backTransparency &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] how "clear" an object is: 1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: transparency < .5 opaque, transparency > .5 transparent.
attribute.name: backTransparency

attribute.tooltip: [diffuseColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0.8 0.8 0.8"] [0,1] how much direct, angle-dependent light is reflected from all light sources. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet.
attribute.name: diffuseColor

attribute.tooltip: [emissiveColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] how much glowing light is emitted from this object. ข้อเสนอแนะ: emissiveColors glow even when all lights are off. ข้อเสนอแนะ: reset diffuseColor from default (.8 .8 .8) to (0 0 0) to avoid washout. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only emissiveColor affects IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet. Warning: bright emissiveColor values can wash out other colors and some textures.
attribute.name: emissiveColor

attribute.tooltip: [specularColor &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,1] specular highlights are brightness reflections (example: shiny spots on an apple). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: specularColor

attribute.tooltip: [shininess &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] low values provide soft specular glows, high values provide sharper, smaller highlights. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: shininess

attribute.tooltip: [ambientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.2"] [0,1] how much ambient omnidirectional light is reflected from all light sources. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: ambientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [transparency &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] how "clear" an object is: 1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: transparency < .5 opaque, transparency > .5 transparent.
attribute.name: transparency

element.tooltip: Viewpoint provides a specific location and direction where the user may view the scene. NavigationInfo, Background, TextureBackground, Fog, LocalFog, OrthoViewpoint and Viewpoint are bindable nodes.
element.name: Viewpoint

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [description &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Text description or navigation hint to identify this Viewpoint. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use spaces, make descriptions clear and readable. Warning: without description, this Viewpoint is unlikely to appear on browser Viewpoints menu. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark). Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [position &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 10"] position (x, y, z in meters) relative to local coordinate system.
attribute.name: position

attribute.tooltip: [orientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Rotation (axis, angle in radians) of Viewpoint, relative to default -Z axis direction in local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: this is orientation _change_ from default direction (0 0 -1). ข้อเสนอแนะ: complex rotations can be accomplished axis-by-axis using parent Transforms.
attribute.name: orientation

attribute.tooltip: [centerOfRotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] centerOfRotation point relates to NavigationInfo EXAMINE mode.
attribute.name: centerOfRotation

attribute.tooltip: [fieldOfView &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.7854" (0,π)] Preferred minimum viewing angle from this viewpoint in radians. Small field of view roughly corresponds to a telephoto lens, large field of view roughly corresponds to a wide-angle lens. ข้อเสนอแนะ: modifying Viewpoint distance to object may be better for zooming. Warning: fieldOfView may not be correct for different window sizes and aspect ratios. Interchange profile ข้อเสนอแนะ: this field may be ignored.
attribute.name: fieldOfView

attribute.tooltip: [jump &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Transition instantly by jumping, or smoothly adjust offsets in place when changing to this Viewpoint. ข้อเสนอแนะ: set jump=true for smooth camera motion when going to this viewpoint.
attribute.name: jump

attribute.tooltip: [retainUserOffsets &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Retain (true) or reset to zero (false) any prior user navigation offsets from defined viewpoint position, orientation.
attribute.name: retainUserOffsets

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Sending event set_bind=true makes this node active. Sending event set_bind=false makes this node inactive. Thus setting set_bind to true/false will pop/push (enable/disable) this Viewpoint.
attribute.name: set_bind

attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Event sent when node becomes active/inactive.
attribute.name: bindTime

attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Event true sent when node becomes active, event false sent when unbound by another node.
attribute.name: isBound

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: ViewpointGroup collects Viewpoint, OrthoViewpoint and other ViewpointGroup nodes for better user-navigation support with a common description.

attribute.tooltip: [displayed &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] displayed determines whether this ViewpointGroup is displayed in the current viewpoint list.

attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [size &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] size of Proximity box. ข้อเสนอแนะ: size 0 0 0 specifies that ViewpointGroup is always usable and displayable.

element.tooltip: VisibilitySensor detects when user can see a specific object or region as they navigate the world. This region is bounded by a box. ข้อเสนอแนะ: often used to attract user attention or improve performance. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Sensors are affected by peer nodes and children of peers.
element.name: VisibilitySensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Translation offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [size &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] size of visibility box, measured from center in meters.
attribute.name: size

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when triggering the sensor. isActive=true when entering visibility region, isActive=false when exiting visibility region.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [enterTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time event generated when user's camera enters visibility region for sensor.
attribute.name: enterTime

attribute.tooltip: [exitTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time event generated when user's camera exits visibility region for sensor.
attribute.name: exitTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: WorldInfo contains persistent documentation information about the 3D world.
element.name: WorldInfo

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [title &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] title of this world, placed in window title. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: title

attribute.tooltip: [info &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Additional information about this world. ข้อเสนอแนะ: MFString arrays can have multiple values, so separate each individual string by quote marks [ "http://www.url1.org" "http://www.url2.org" "etc." ]. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).
attribute.name: info

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: X3D is the top-most XML element for an Extensible 3D (X3D) Graphics file. The X3D element contains a single head element for metadata, and a single Scene element which is root node of the 3D scene graph. ข้อเสนอแนะ: add or select a Scene tag to edit the scene graph.
element.name: X3D

attribute.tooltip: [version (3.0 | 3.1 | 3.2 | 3.3) #REQUIRED] Default is highest value matching schema and DOCTYPE in the scene. X3D version 3.0 corresponds to X3D 2004, version 3.3 corresponds to 2012.
attribute.name: version

attribute.tooltip: [profile &profileNames; #REQUIRED] Profile defines the browser or tool support needed for this scene. Core corresponds to empty profile, used for defining capabilities via components only. Interchange corresponds to lightweight scene-graph geometry and output-only devices. Interactive corresponds to Interchange geometry plus simple user interaction. Immersive provides approximate match to VRML97 with Script and Prototypes. Full contains all nodes defined in X3D specification.
attribute.name: profile

attribute.tooltip: [xmlns:xsd CDATA "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"] XML namespace (xmlns) for XML Schema Definition (xsd).
attribute.name: xmlns:xsd

attribute.tooltip: [xsd:noNamespaceSchemaLocation CDATA "http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.3.xsd"] url for the X3D Schema defining the X3D document-validation rules.
attribute.name: xsd:noNamespaceSchemaLocation

element.tooltip: Comment can be used anywhere to make a scene clearer. ข้อเสนอแนะ: only enter comments using this node, don't put comments into attribute values. ข้อเสนอแนะ: VRML comments start with a # symbol and do not have to be retained by a browser. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Use WorldInfo for persistent comments that must stay with a Scene.
element.name: XML_COMMENT

element.tooltip: TEXT (text data).
element.name: XML_TEXT

element.tooltip: CDATA (Character Data) Section Preserves literal character data verbatim. CDATA protects contained text from any XML substitutions. ข้อเสนอแนะ: CDATA protects < and > operators in contained Script code. ข้อเสนอแนะ: VRML comments start with a # symbol and do not have to be retained by a browser. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Use WorldInfo for persistent comments that must stay with a Scene.
element.name: XML_CDATA

element.tooltip: Processing Instruction (PI) - Use it to pass directions and information to programs.
element.name: XML_PI

element.tooltip: Document Type Definition (DTD).
element.name: XML_DOCUMENT_TYPE

element.tooltip: EspduTransform is a networked Transform node that can contain most nodes. EspduTransform integrates functionality for the following DIS PDUs: EntityStatePdu CollisionPdu DetonatePdu FirePdu CreateEntity RemoveEntity. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.
element.name: EspduTransform

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [readInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0.1"] Seconds between read updates, 0 means no reading.

attribute.tooltip: [writeInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "1.0"] Seconds between write updates, 0 means no writing.
attribute.name: writeInterval

attribute.tooltip: [networkMode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &DisNetworkModeValues; standAlone] Whether this entity is ignoring the network, sending DIS packets to the network, or receiving DIS packets from the network. (1) standAlone: ignore network but still respond to events in local scene. (2) networkReader: listen to network and read PDU packets at readInterval, act as remote copy of entity. (3) networkWriter: send PDU packets to network at writeInterval, act as master entity. Default value "standAlone" ensures that DIS network activation within a scene as networkReader or networkWriter is intentional. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value.
attribute.name: networkMode

attribute.tooltip: [isStandAlone &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Whether networkMode="local" (ignore network but still respond to local events)
attribute.name: isStandAlone

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkReader &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Whether networkMode="remote" (listen to network as copy of remote entity)
attribute.name: isNetworkReader

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkWriter &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Whether networkMode="master" (output to network as master entity at writeInterval)
attribute.name: isNetworkWriter

attribute.tooltip: [address &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; localhost] Multicast network address, or else "localhost" Example: 224.2.181.145.
attribute.name: address

attribute.tooltip: [port &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Multicast port Example: 62040.
attribute.name: port

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayHost &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Fallback server address if multicast not available locally. Example: devo.cs.nps.navy.mil.
attribute.name: multicastRelayHost

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayPort &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Fallback server port if multicast not available locally. Example: 8010.
attribute.name: multicastRelayPort

attribute.tooltip: [rtpHeaderExpected &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Whether RTP headers are prepended to DIS PDUs.

attribute.tooltip: [timestamp &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] DIS timestamp in VRML time units from latest update.

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.

attribute.tooltip: [networkMode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &DisNetworkModeValues; standAlone] Whether this entity is ignoring the network, sending DIS packets to the network, or receiving DIS packets from the network. (1) standAlone: ignore network but still respond to events in local scene. (2) networkReader: listen to network and read PDU packets at readInterval, act as remote copy of entity. (3) networkWriter: send PDU packets to network at writeInterval, act as master entity. Default value "standAlone" ensures that DIS network activation within a scene as networkReader or networkWriter is intentional. Warning: do not wrap quotation marks around this SFString enumeration value.
attribute.name: networkMode

element.tooltip: DISEntityTypeMapping maps received DIS Entity type information to an X3D model, thus providing visual and behavioral representations matching received packets. Fields are processed in order: kind, domain, country, category, subcategory, specific, extra. ข้อเสนอแนะ: 0 values are wildcards. All values in the ordered list must be 0 after the first 0 is defined.
element.name: DISEntityTypeMapping

element.tooltip: GeoCoordinate builds geometry as a set of geographic 3D coordinates. These are transformed into a geocentric, curved-earth representation. GeoCoordinate is only used by IndexedFaceSet, IndexedLineSet, LineSet and PointSet. GeoCoordinate can contain a GeoOrigin node.

attribute.tooltip: [point &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3dLabel; #IMPLIED] point contains a set of actual 3D geographic coordinates, provided in geoSystem format can split strings if desired: "x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2" or "x1 y1 z1", "x2 y2 z2"

GeoElevationGrid can contain GeoOrigin, Color/ColorRGBA, Normal and TextureCoordinate nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.

attribute.tooltip: [geoSystem &initializeOnlyLabel; &GeoSystemType;] Identifies spatial reference frame: Geodetic (GD), Geocentric (GC), Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM). Supported values: "GD" "UTM" or "GC" followed by optional additional string parameters. Warning: deprecated values are GDC (use GD) and GCC (use GC).
attribute.name: geoSystem

attribute.tooltip: [geoGridOrigin &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3dLabel; "0 0 0"] geographic coordinate for southwest (lower-left) corner of height dataset.
attribute.name: geoGridOrigin

attribute.tooltip: [xDimension &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Number of grid-array elements along east-west X direction. ข้อเสนอแนะ: total horizontal x-axis distance equals (xDimension-1) * xSpacing.
attribute.name: xDimension

attribute.tooltip: [zDimension &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Number of grid-array elements along north-south Z direction. ข้อเสนอแนะ: total vertical z-axis distance equals (zDimension-1) * zSpacing.
attribute.name: zDimension

attribute.tooltip: [xSpacing &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFDoubleLabel; "1.0"] Distance between grid-array vertices along east-west X direction when geoSystem is GDC, xSpacing is number of degrees of longitude when geoSystem is UTM, xSpacing is number of eastings (meters).
attribute.name: xSpacing

attribute.tooltip: [zSpacing &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFDoubleLabel; "1.0"] Distance between grid-array vertices along north-south Z direction when geoSystem is GDC, zSpacing is number of degrees of latitude when geoSystem is UTM, zSpacing is number of northings (meters).
attribute.name: zSpacing

attribute.tooltip: [yScale &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.0"] Vertical exaggeration of displayed data.
attribute.name: yScale

attribute.tooltip: [height &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #IMPLIED] Contains xDimension rows * zDimension columns floating-point values for elevation above ellipsoid values are in row-major order from west to east, south to north geoGridOrigin is in southwest (lower-left) corner of height dataset.
attribute.name: height

attribute.tooltip: [set_height &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #FIXED ""] Contains xDimension rows * zDimension columns floating-point values for elevation above ellipsoid values are in row-major order from west to east, south to north geoGridOrigin is in southwest (lower-left) corner of height dataset.
attribute.name: set_height

attribute.tooltip: [ccw &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] ccw = counterclockwise: ordering of vertex coordinates orientation. ข้อเสนอแนะ: ccw false can reverse solid (backface culling) and normal-vector orientation.
attribute.name: ccw

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [creaseAngle &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,∞) creaseAngle defines angle (in radians) for determining whether adjacent polygons are drawn with sharp edges or smooth shading. If angle between normals of two adjacent polygons is less than creaseAngle, smooth shading is rendered across the shared line segment. ข้อเสนอแนะ: creaseAngle=0 means render all edges sharply, creaseAngle=3.14159 means render all edges smoothly.
attribute.name: creaseAngle

attribute.tooltip: [colorPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Color node is applied per vertex (true) or per quadrilateral (false).
attribute.name: colorPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [normalPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether Normal vectors are applied per vertex (true) or per quadrilateral (false).
attribute.name: normalPerVertex

attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [geoSystem &initializeOnlyLabel; &GeoSystemType;] Identifies spatial reference frame: Geodetic (GD), Geocentric (GC), Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM). Supported values: "GD" "UTM" or "GC" followed by optional additional string parameters. Warning: deprecated values are GDC (use GD) and GCC (use GC).
attribute.name: geoSystem

attribute.tooltip: [key &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Definition parameters for linear-interpolation function time intervals, in increasing order and corresponding to keyValues. Warning: number of keys must match number of keyValues!
attribute.name: key

attribute.tooltip: [keyValue &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3dLabel; #IMPLIED] Output values for linear interpolation, each corresponding to time-fraction keys. Warning: number of keys must match number of keyValues!
attribute.name: keyValue

attribute.tooltip: [set_fraction &inputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] set_fraction selects input key for corresponding keyValue output.
attribute.name: set_fraction

attribute.tooltip: [value_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] Linearly interpolated output value determined by current key time and corresponding keyValue pair.
attribute.name: value_changed

attribute.tooltip: [geovalue_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3dLabel; #FIXED ""] interpolated coordinate in the geographic coordinate system specified by geoSystem
attribute.name: geovalue_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) GeoProximitySensor generates events when the viewer enters, exits and moves within a region of space (defined by a box). ข้อเสนอแนะ: multiple USEd instances are cumulative, but avoid overlaps. ข้อเสนอแนะ: can first use GeoTransform to relocate/reorient box. ข้อเสนอแนะ: surround entire world to start behaviors once scene is loaded.

element.tooltip: GeoTransform is a Grouping node that can contain most nodes. GeoTransform translates, orients and scales GeoCoordinate geometry within the local world coordinate system. GeoTransform coordinate system X-Z plane is tangent to ellipsoid of local spatial reference frame. ข้อเสนอแนะ: +Y axis is up. ข้อเสนอแนะ: insert a Shape node before adding geometry or Appearance.
element.name: GeoTransform

attribute.tooltip: [children &inputOutputLabel; &MFNodeLabel; empty list] [X3DChildNode] Grouping nodes contain a list of children nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Each grouping node defines a coordinate space for its children, relative to the coordinate space of its parent node. Thus transformations accumulate down the scene graph hierarchy.
attribute.name: children

attribute.tooltip: [translation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Position (x, y, z in meters) of children relative to local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Orientation (axis, angle in radians) of children relative to local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.tooltip: [geoCenter &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Translation offset from origin of local coordinate system, applied prior to rotation or scaling. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: geoCenter

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 1 1"] Non-uniform x-y-z scale of child coordinate system, adjusted by center and scaleOrientation. ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: scale

attribute.tooltip: [scaleOrientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Preliminary rotation of coordinate system before scaling (to allow scaling around arbitrary orientations). ข้อเสนอแนะ: The order of operation is first apply the center offset, then scaleOrientation and scale, then rotation, then restore the center offset, then translation.
attribute.name: scaleOrientation

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: GeoViewpoint specifies viewpoints using geographic coordinates. GeoViewpoint can contain a GeoOrigin node. Since GeoViewpoint must navigate smoothly inside a curved geographic coordinate system, it includes both Viewpoint and NavigationInfo attributes.
element.name: GeoViewpoint

Supported values: "GD" "UTM" or "GC" followed by optional additional string parameters. Warning: deprecated values are GDC (use GD) and GCC (use GC).

attribute.tooltip: [description &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Text description to be displayed for action of this node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: use spaces, make descriptions clear and readable. ข้อเสนอแนะ: many XML tools substitute XML character references automatically if needed (like & for & ampersand or " for " quotation mark).

position
attribute.tooltip: [position &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3dLabel; "0 0 100000"] position relative to local georeferenced coordinate system, in proper format

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.tooltip: [orientation &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] Rotation of Viewpoint, relative to default -Z axis direction in local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: this is orientation _change_ from default direction (0 0 -1) +Y axis is the up vector for the local area (the normal to the tangent plane on the ellipsoid), -Z points towards the north pole, and +X is east 1 0 0 -1.570796 always looks down.

attribute.name: navType
attribute.tooltip: [navType &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; "EXAMINE" "ANY"] Enter one or more Strings: "EXAMINE" "WALK" "FLY" "LOOKAT" "ANY" "NONE". ข้อเสนอแนะ: usability often improves with type="EXAMINE" "ANY".

attribute.name: headlight
attribute.tooltip: [headlight &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enable/disable directional light that always points in the direction the user is looking

attribute.name: fieldOfView
attribute.tooltip: [fieldOfView &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.7854" (0,π)] Preferred minimum viewing angle from this viewpoint in radians. Small field of view roughly corresponds to a telephoto lens, large field of view roughly corresponds to a wide-angle lens.

attribute.name: jump
attribute.tooltip: [jump &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Whether to transition instantly by jumping, or else smoothly animate to this Viewpoint.

attribute.name: speedFactor
attribute.tooltip: [speedFactor &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] [0,+infinity) Default rate at which viewer travels through scene, meters/second.

attribute.name: set_bind
attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] set_bind true makes this node active, set_bind false makes this node inactive.

attribute.name: set_position
attribute.tooltip: [set_position &inputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3dLabel; #FIXED ""] position relative to local georeferenced coordinate system, in proper format

attribute.name: set_orientation
attribute.tooltip: [set_orientation &inputOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; #FIXED ""] Rotation of Viewpoint, relative to default -Z axis direction in local coordinate system. ข้อเสนอแนะ: this is orientation _change_ from default direction (0 0 -1) +Y axis is the up vector for the local area (the normal to the tangent plane on the ellipsoid), -Z points towards the north pole, and +X is east 1 0 0 -1.570796 always looks down.

attribute.name: bindTime
attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Event sent when node becomes active/inactive.

attribute.name: isBound
attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] Event true sent when node becomes active, event false sent when unbound by another node.

[containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.

element.tooltip: HAnimDisplacer nodes are used to alter the shape of individual segments. HAnimDisplacer can be used in three different ways: (a) identify vertices corresponding to a particular feature on the HAnimSegment, (b) represent a particular muscular action displacing vertices in various directions (linearly or radially), and (c) represent a complete configuration of the vertices in an HAnimSegment. For example, in the case of a face, there might be an HAnimDisplacer for each facial expression. ข้อเสนอแนะ: name suffixes include _feature, _action and _config. Multiple HAnimDisplacer nodes must appear consecutively inside HAnimSegment. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/HAnim.html H-Anim Specification ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/ObjectInterfaces.html#Displacer
element.name: HAnimDisplacer

attribute.name: DEF
attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF defines a unique ID name for this node, referencable by other nodes

attribute.name: USE
attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น

attribute.name: name
attribute.tooltip: [name &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #REQUIRED] Unique name attribute must be defined so that HAnimDisplacer node can be identified at runtime for animation purposes. Examples: sellion r_infraorbitale etc. listed in H-Anim Specification. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Basic/HumanoidAnimation/tables/HAnimFeaturePoints19774V1.0.txt ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/FeaturePoints.html

attribute.name: coordIndex
attribute.tooltip: [coordIndex &inputOutputLabel; &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] Defines coordinate array of HAnimSegment vertices affected by HAnimDisplacer indices provide order in which coordinates are applied order starts at index 0, commas are optional between sets use -1 to separate indices for each feature

attribute.name: displacements
attribute.tooltip: [displacements &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3fLabel; #IMPLIED] Set of 3D values added to neutral or resting position of each set of HAnimSegment vertices referenced by coordIndex field

attribute.name: weight
attribute.tooltip: [weight &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; 0.0] Scale displacements using weight value before adding them to neutral vertex positions.

[containerField NMTOKEN "displacers"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

element.tooltip: The HAnimHumanoid node is used to: (a) store references to the joints, segments, sites, skin and viewpoints, (b) serve as a container for the entire humanoid, (c) provide a convenient way of moving the humanoid through its environment, and (d) store human-readable data such as author and copyright information. HAnimHumanoid contains HAnimJoint, HAnimSegment, HAnimSite, Coordinate/CoordinateDouble, Normal, and Viewpoint nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/HAnim.html H-Anim Specification ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/ObjectInterfaces.html#Humanoid
element.name: HAnimHumanoid

element.tooltip: Each joint in the body is represented by an HAnimJoint node. HAnimJoint may only be a child of another HAnimJoint node, or skeleton field for the HAnimHumanoid. Warning: an HAnimJoint may not be a child of an HAnimSegment. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/HAnim.html H-Anim Specification ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/ObjectInterfaces.html#Joint

attribute.tooltip: [llimit &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Lower limit for minimum joint rotation in radians. ข้อเสนอแนะ: always contains 3 values, one for each local axis.

element.tooltip: An HAnimSite node serves three purposes: (a) define an "end effector" location which can be used by an inverse kinematics system, (b) define an attachment point for accessories such as jewelry and clothing, and (c) define a location for a virtual camera in the reference frame of an HAnimSegment (such as a view "through the eyes" of the humanoid for use in multi-user worlds). ข้อเสนอแนะ: HAnimSites are stored as children of an HAnimSegment node. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/HAnim.html H-Anim Specification ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19774/V1.0/HAnim/ObjectInterfaces.html#Site

element.tooltip: Contour2D groups a set of curve segments to a composite contour Children segments form a closed loop, with first point of first child repeated as last point of last child and last point of segment repeated as first point of consecutive segment Children segments are type NurbsCurve2D or ContourPolyline2D, enumerated in consecutive order of contour topology.

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [uClosed &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Whether opposite surface sides are closed (seamless) across u dimension.
attribute.name: uClosed

attribute.tooltip: [vClosed &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Whether opposite surface sides are closed (seamless) across u dimension.
attribute.name: vClosed

attribute.tooltip: [uDimension &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Number of control points in u dimension.
attribute.name: uDimension

attribute.tooltip: [vDimension &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Number of control points in v dimension.
attribute.name: vDimension

attribute.tooltip: [uKnot &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #IMPLIED] Knot vector, where size = number of control points + order of curve.
attribute.name: uKnot

attribute.tooltip: [vKnot &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #IMPLIED] Knot vector, where size = number of control points + order of curve.
attribute.name: vKnot

attribute.tooltip: [uOrder &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "3"] Define order of surface by polynomials of degree = order-1.
attribute.name: uOrder

attribute.tooltip: [vOrder &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFInt32Label; "3"] Define order of surface by polynomials of degree = order-1.
attribute.name: vOrder

attribute.tooltip: [uTessellation &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] hint for surface tesselation.
attribute.name: uTessellation

attribute.tooltip: [vTessellation &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] hint for surface tesselation.
attribute.name: vTessellation

attribute.tooltip: [weight &inputOutputLabel; &MFDoubleLabel; #IMPLIED] Vector assigning weight to each control point.
attribute.name: weight

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Setting solid true means draw only one side of polygons (backface culling on), setting solid false means draw both sides of polygons (backface culling off). Warning: default value true can completely hide geometry if viewed from wrong side! ข้อเสนอแนะ: if in doubt, use solid='false' for maximum visibility.
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "texCoord"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: (v3.1 or later) TextureCoordinate3D specifies a set of 3D texture coordinates used by vertex-based geometry nodes (such as IndexedFaceSet or ElevationGrid) to map 3D textures to vertices. ข้อเสนอแนะ: add Shape and then polgyonal/planar geometry before adding texture coordinates.

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [USE IDREF #IMPLIED] USE คือการเรียกใช้ใหม่สำหรับโหนด DEF ID ที่ถูกประกาศไว้แล้ว (Reuse), แต่ไม่รวมถึงโหนดลูกอื่นๆและคุณลักษณะ (attribute) อื่นๆด้วย (ยกเว้น containerField ที่มีค่าที่แตกต่าง) ข้อเสนอแนะ: การใช้ USE สามารถเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงานได้ (แบบที่ไม่ใช่การ duplicate โหนด) Warning: do NOT include any child nodes, a DEF attribute, or any other attribute values (except for containerField) when defining a USE attribute. attribute.name: USE

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) ClipPlane specifies a single plane equation used to clip (i.e. cull or hide) displayed geometry. The plane field specifies a four-component plane equation that describes both inside and outside half space. ข้อเสนอแนะ: negate all plane values to reverse which side of plane has visibility clipped. ข้อเสนอแนะ: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plane_(geometry)#Distance_from_a_point_to_a_plane
element.name: ClipPlane

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Enables/disables node operation.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [plane &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec4fLabel; "0 1 0 0"] [0,1] If (a,b,c,d) is the plane, with the first three components being a normalized vector describing the plane's normal direction (and thus the fourth component d being distance from the origin), a point (x,y,z) is visible to the user, with regards to the clipping plane, if a*x+b*y+c*z+d is greater than 0.
attribute.name: plane

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) EaseInEaseOut enables gradual animation transitions by modifying TimeSensor fraction outputs. Output values are modified fractions that can be ROUTEd to an interpolator, a sequencer, or another SFFloat attribute. ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical input connection is ROUTE someTimeSensor.fraction_changed TO someEaseInEaseOut.set_fraction ข้อเสนอแนะ: typical output connection is ROUTE someEaseInEaseOut.modifiedFraction_changed TO destinationNode.set_fraction.
element.name: EaseInEaseOut

attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [key &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Definition parameters for linear-interpolation function time intervals, in increasing order and corresponding to easeInEaseOut array. ข้อเสนอแนะ: number of keys must be one more than the number of easeInEaseOut values!
attribute.name: key

attribute.tooltip: [easeInEaseOut &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec2fLabel; #IMPLIED] Array of paired values for easeOut fraction and easeIn fraction within each key interval. ข้อเสนอแนะ: number of easeInEaseOut values must be one less than the number of keys.
attribute.name: easeInEaseOut

attribute.tooltip: [set_fraction &inputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] set_fraction selects input fraction for computation of corresponding easeInEaseOut output value, modifiedFraction_changed.
attribute.name: set_fraction

attribute.tooltip: [modifiedFraction_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] Interpolated output value determined by current key time, corresponding easeInEaseOut smoothing intervals, and corresponding key pair.
attribute.name: modifiedFraction_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField NMTOKEN "children"] containerField is the field-label prefix indicating relationship to parent node. Examples: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. ข้อเสนอแนะ: containerField attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) TransformSensor generates output events when its targetObject enters, exits, and moves within a region in space (defined by a box). ข้อเสนอแนะ: Each TransformSensor node behaves independently of all other TransformSensor nodes, so that every enabled TransformSensor node affected by targetObject motion sends output events. ข้อเสนอแนะ: multiply instanced (DEF/USE) TransformSensor nodes in different locations use the union of all boxes to check for enter and exit, detecting enter and exit for all instances of the box, and sending enter/exit events appropriately. For non-overlapping bounding boxes, position_changed and orientation_changed events are calculated relative to the coordinate system associated with the bounding box in which the proximity was detected. Warning: results are undefined if boxes overlap for multiply instanced TransformSensor nodes. Warning: a TransformSensor node with a zero-volume box (i.e. any size dimension equal to 0.0) cannot generate events, equivalent to enabled=false. Warning: unlike TouchSensor nodes, there is no notion of a TransformSensor node lower in the scene graph grabbing events.
element.name: TransformSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

attribute.tooltip: [targetObject &inputOutputLabel; &SFNodeLabel; NULL] [[X3DGroupingNode|X3DShapeNode] targetObject is the movable geometry represented by any valid X3DGroupingNode or X3DShapeNode which may enter or exit the box.

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] isActive true/false events are sent when triggering the sensor. isActive=true when targetObject enters the box region, isActive=false when targetObject exits the box region.

attribute.tooltip: [enterTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time event generated when targetObject enters the box region for sensor.

attribute.tooltip: [exitTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] Time event generated when targetObject exits the box region for sensor.
attribute.name: exitTime

attribute.tooltip: [position_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] Sends translation event relative to center whenever the target object is contained within the box region and results change.
attribute.name: position_changed

attribute.tooltip: [orientation_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; #FIXED ""] Sends rotation event relative to center whenever the target object is contained within the box region and results change.

attribute.tooltip: [closed &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] Whether or not the curve is closed (i.e. matching end values), with continuous velocity vectors as the interpolator transitions from the last key to the first key. Warning: if velocity vectors at first and last keys are specified, the closed field is ignored. Warning: if keyValues at first and last key are not identical, the closed field is ignored.
attribute.name: closed

attribute.tooltip: [key &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Definition parameters for nonlinear-interpolation function time intervals, in increasing order and corresponding to keyValue, keyVelocity array values. Warning: number of keys must match number of keyValues!
attribute.name: key

attribute.tooltip: [keyValue &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3fLabel; #IMPLIED] Output values for nonlinear interpolation, each corresponding to time-fraction keys. Warning: number of keys must match number of keyValues!
attribute.name: keyValue

attribute.tooltip: [keyVelocity &inputOutputLabel; &MFVec3fLabel; #IMPLIED] Output values for nonlinear interpolation, each corresponding to time-fraction keys. Warning: number of keys must match number of keyVelocity values!

attribute.name: children

attribute.tooltip: [viewport &inputOutputLabel; &SFNodeLabel; NULL] [X3DViewportNode] The viewport field is a single Viewport node that constrains layer output to a sub-region of the render surface.

attribute.tooltip: [isPickable &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] isPickable determines whether pick traversal is performed for this layer.
attribute.name: isPickable

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) LayerSet defines a list of layers and a rendering order. The rendering order is specified by the order field. ข้อเสนอแนะ: the layer first specified in the order field will be the first layer rendered and will appear to be below any other layers. The layer last specified in the order field will be the last layer rendered and will correspondingly appear to be on top of all other layers. Warning: only one LayerSet node is allowed iin a scene, and it shall be a root node at the top of the scene graph.
element.name: LayerSet

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย

Warning: แต่ละค่าของ USE จะต้องตรงกับค่า DEF ที่ถูกประกาศก่อนหน้าใน Scene นั้น
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [layers &inputOutputLabel; &MFNodeLabel; empty list] [X3DLayerNode] The layers list defines a list of Layer nodes that contain the constituent parts of the scene. Each layer is assigned an ordinal number depending on its position in this contained list of nodes. ข้อเสนอแนะ: Ordinal values start with the numeral 1 representing the first item in the list. ข้อเสนอแนะ: nodes that are not part of a layer are considered to be in layer 0.
attribute.name: layers

attribute.tooltip: [activeLayer &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] [0,∞] activeLayer field specifies the layer in which navigation takes place. ข้อเสนอแนะ: nodes that are not part of a layer are considered to be in layer 0.
attribute.name: activeLayer

attribute.tooltip: [order &inputOutputLabel; &MFInt32Label; "0"] [0,∞] The order list defines the order in which layers are rendered. Each value corresponds to the ordinals of the layers. ข้อเสนอแนะ: the order list may contain repetitions of ordinal values, in which case the layer is rendered again. Warning: if order contains number values that are not ordinals assigned to layers, such numbers are ignored. Warning: layers that are not included in the order list are not rendered.
attribute.name: order

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Bounding box center: position offset from origin of local coordinate system.
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] Bounding box size: automatically calculated, can be specified as an optimization or constraint.
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class CDATA #IMPLIED] class is a space-separated list of classes, reserved for use by XML stylesheets. class attribute is only supported in XML encoding of X3D scenes.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: (v3.2 or later) Viewport is a Grouping node that can contain most nodes. Viewport specifies a set of rectangular clip boundaries against which the children nodes are clipped as they are rendered.
element.name: Viewport

attribute.tooltip: [DEF ID #IMPLIED] DEF เป็นการกำหนดชื่อ ID เฉพาะสำหรับโหนดซึ่งสามารถอ้างอิงได้จากโหนดอื่น ข้อเสนอแนะ: ชื่อ DEF ควรมีความชัดเจน บ่งบอกถึงโหนดนั้นว่าคืออะไรหรือทำอะไรอย่างมีความหมาย
